snippet: After a bruising three-month struggle, the Senate voted 59 to 38 on Monday to resurrect federal jobless benefits for the long-term unemployed.
abstract: Senate votes 59 to 38 to resurrect federal jobless benefits for long-term unemployed, capping a bruising three-month struggle.
lead_paragraph: After a bruising three-month struggle, the Senate voted 59 to 38 on Monday to resurrect federal jobless benefits for the long-term unemployed.

headline.main: Senate Approves Renewal of Jobless Pay
headline.print_headline: Senate Approves Renewal of Jobless Pay
